headline: Autodesk Sues Google And Cuts Jobs As Shares Screen Undervalued
summary: Autodesk has filed a trademark lawsuit against Google over the use of the term "Flow." The company plans a 7% global workforce reduction as it shifts resources toward cloud and AI platforms. Both moves mark a material change in how Autodesk positions its products and allocates capital. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:ADSK, these developments come at a time when the stock has seen pressure, with a 30 day return of 13.5% and a year to date return of 19.9%. The current share price sits at...

headline: Street Confidence Builds as Autodesk, Inc. (ADSK) Gains Enterprise Traction
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) is among the best money-making stocks to buy right now. On February 10, Nay Soe Naing from Berenberg Bank reiterated a Buy rating on Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK), while setting a price target of $370. This suggests an upside potential of approximately 60%. Earlier, on February 2, JPMorgan upgraded Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADSK) to […]
